The midpoint of a line segment connecting (x₁, y₁) and (x₂, y₂) is given by ((x₁ + x₂)/2, (y₁ + y₂)/2). This is concept #50 in the series.
The general form of the equation of a line is Ax + By + C = 0. This is concept #50 in the series.
